data.name: ШХД: ЛЕТО / IT'S SUMMER
data.detailed_description:
You just woke up after a midday nap in your country house surrounded by the swishing sound of turntable. You are 8 years old. It's Summer is an indie video game which genres are “sandbox”, “babushka”, and “midday nap”. The game has neither goal nor sense. There are only you, cheap tea bags with russian tears and the endless yellow field.

The game itself is integral part of the Digital-opera "ШХД: ЛЕТО". This project also contains a book, LP record, series of digital-art collaborations and something more. ШХД: ЛЕТО is the second and final part of the project ШХД: ЗИМА (It's Winter).

data.short_description: Woke up after a midday nap. Country house. Turntable swishing sound. You are 8 years old. It's Summer is an indie video game which genres are “sandbox”, “babushka”, and “midday nap”. The game has neither goal nor sense. Only you, cheap tea bags with russian tears and the endless yellow field.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 or AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or ATI Radeon HD7780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Kaby Lake
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 615
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
